name: environment_scenario_get_the_metrics_of_a_specific_application_deployed
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to get the metrics of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: get the metrics of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

I can fetch metrics for a specific app — I just need two details:

- Environment name (e.g., dev, staging, prod)  
- Application name (exact app identifier)

Optional: a time range (e.g., 3m, 15m, 1h) or a since_timestamp for newly deployed apps.

Please provide those and I’ll start by checking the environment exists.

[options-single-choice: Provide Environment & App, List Environments, Cancel]
